MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetData (string fileName, bool getReadTimeOnly, out long readTime);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetData(string fileName, bool getReadTimeOnly, [out] int64& readTime) cil managed
Public Function GetData (fileName As String, getReadTimeOnly As Boolean, ByRef readTime As Long) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetData(System::String ^ fileName, bool getReadTimeOnly, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % readTime);

param.name: fileName
param.span: Percorso del file di configurazione remoto a cui accedere.

span.span: Path to the remote configuration file to be accessed.

param.name: getReadTimeOnly
param.span: Valore booleano che specifica se viene restituito solo readTime.

span.span: A Boolean value specifying whether only the readTime is returned.

param.name: readTime
param.span: Data e ora dell'ultimo accesso al file.

span.span: Time the file was last accessed.

summary.span: Utilizzato internamente per supportare l'accesso remoto ai dati di configurazione.

span.span: Used internally to support remote access to configuration data.

returns.span: di interi senza segno a 8 bit (byte) contenente i dati di configurazione.

span.span: An of 8-bit unsigned integers (bytes) containing the configuration data.
